entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (neutral_title_grant.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_18: How much do I need to transfer for these?
entries.s_20: Fairly self explanatory. One million credits for the Millionaire title, and one billion credits for the Billionaire title.
entries.s_22: I will take the Millionaire title please.
entries.s_27: How much do I need to transfer for these?
entries.s_29: Okay, come back any time if you change your mind.
entries.s_30: You had best go get those credits now.
entries.s_32: Great! On behalf of the InterGalactic Banking Clan,  I hereby grant you the title 'Millionaire'.
entries.s_35: No, we ask that you transfer one-hundred million at a time. This will help prevent fraudulent slicing. Once you have transferred all one billion credits you will receive the title.
entries.s_36: Alright, I am ready to transfer the credits.
entries.s_38: You had best go get those credits now.
entries.s_39: I see you have already purchased all the titles available.
entries.s_40: Wow that's a lot of credits! I don't think I am interested.
entries.s_41: Great! On behalf of the InterGalactic Banking Clan,  I thank you for your patronage.
entries.s_42: Do I transfer all one billion now?
entries.s_5: Welcome! I am Ozzmos Roberts. Are you here to purchase your official title?
entries.s_9: The InterGalactic Banking Clan has decreed that if you open a savings account with them, they will give you an official title based on the amount you transfer.
